title: Zardoz Zord
contents: property | title | Captain of the Sea Maiden's Faire

title: Potion of Healing
contents: description | usage | To drink a potion yourself requires a bonus action, to administer to someone else requires an action.

title: Renear Neverember
contents: property | title | Son of Dagult Neverember, former Open Lord of Waterdeep.

title: Mattrim Mereg
contents: description | description | Is called "Threestrings" by his friends. Takes pride in playing songs on a lute with only three strings. Has a major crush on Bonnie the Waitress.

title: Floon Blagmaar
contents: property | title | Professional companion and party goer.

title: Yagra Stonefist
contents: description | description | Grew up in a tough neighbourhood and likes to show her strength by arm-wrestling.

title: Obaya Uday
contents: property | title | Cleric of Waukeen (God of Trade)
description | description | Has come to Waterdeep to buy magical items for her lord in Chult. Completely in awe of Waterdeep.

title: Meloon Wardragon
contents: description | description | Belongs to Force Grey. Likes to catch up with adventurers in the Yawning Portal.

title: Jalester Silvermane
contents: property | title | Luitenant for Laeral Silverhand
description | description | Lost his husband during the Ordning. Is currently very sad about this.

title: Bonnie
contents: description | description | Recently arrived, trying to escape the recent troubles.  Is aware of the crush that Mattrim Mereg has on her.

title: Durnan
contents: property | title | Owner and bartender of the Yawning Portal
description | description | Former adventurer with Mirt the Moneylender. Went into Undermountain and came out rich and with extended life. He is 130 years old and still a formidable fighter.

title: Talisolvanar Fellbranch
contents: text | Carpenter, Owner of the "Bent Nail". Sells wooden weapons, shields and furniture.

title: Embric
contents: text | Co-owner of 'Steam and Steel'. Expert weapon-smith. Married to Avi.

title: Avi
contents: Co-owner of 'Steam and Steel'. Expert armorsmith and locksmith. Married to Embric.

title: Fala Lefaliir
contents: text | Owner of 'Corellon's Crown'. Sells herbal medicine, plants and the following potions:

title: Vincent Trench
contents: text | Owner of the 'Tiger's eye', a private investigation firm.  A standard investigation costs 50 gp.

title: Rishaal
contents: text | Owner of 'Book Wyrm's Treasure'. Sells books about all kinds of topics and also owns a small collection of spellbooks. Allows wizards to copy spells and will scribe scrolls for double the price.

title: Zumbo Goldpants
contents: text | Screenwriter and director at the Seven Masks Theater.

title: Rongquan Mystere
contents: text | Owner of the Seven Masks theater.

title: Lofik "Brick" Leadmantle
contents: text | Owner of Luc's character's Mom.

title: Mellanor Fellbranch
contents: text | Contact for the Emerald Enclave.

title: Vajra Safahr
contents: text | The current Blackstaff of Waterdeep and leader of Force Grey (Gray Hands).

title: Mirt the Moneylender
contents: text | Adventuring companion of Durnan. Very rich and blessed with long life. A known masked lord of Waterdeep and member of the Harpers.

title: Laeral Silverhand
contents: text | Open Lord of Waterdeep and leader of the Lord's Alliance.
text | Chosen of the Goddess of Magic and one of the most powerful wizards alive.

title: Esteban Santiago
contents: text | Lead character in a theater play at the "Pink Flumph".
text | Arch-Rival of Rogelio de la Vega.

title: Davil Starsong
contents: text | Leader of the Doom-Raiders and Zhentarim faction.
text | Master of Opportunities and Communication

title: Tashlyn Jafeera
contents: text | Officer of the Doom Raiders
text | Captain of the Watch in South Ward.

title: Skeemo Weirdbottle
contents: text | Officer of the Doom Raiders

title: Istrid Horn
contents: text | Officer of the Doom Raiders

title: Ziraj the Hunter
contents: text | Officer of the Doom Raiders

title: Remmalia Haventree
contents: text | Harper with a huge grudge against the Cult of the Dragon.

title: Ulkoria Stonemarrow
contents: text | Known as the "Gargoyle" because of her constant scowling.
text | An Archmage with a Shield Guardian following her around at all times.
text | Previous owner of Trollskull Manor
text | Will cast Glyph of Warding for 250 gp.

title: Savra Belabranta
contents: text | Member of the Belabranta Noble Family, they breed and train the Griffons for the griffon cavalry.
text | Contact of the Order of the Gauntlet.

title: Jim Jonas Janssen Jr.
contents: text | Editor and Owner for the Waterdeep Wazoo, a popular broadsheet company.
